emails.subject: RE: DNEXT - Login Credential
emails.body_text:
Hello Charles,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Just following up regarding the demo session.

 

I’d be glad to walk you through the platform and highlight its main features.

Let me know when it would be convenient for you, and I’ll arrange accordingly.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 
Sent: Monday, September 29, 2025 9:22
To: Elfi Middelbeek <elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io>; Charles Carriere <charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXT - Login Credential

 

Hello Charles,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We would like to propose a quick demo session where I can walk you through the key features and show you some tips for using it more effectively.

Please let us know which time suits you best and we will arrange accordingly.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Elfi Middelbeek <elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io <mailto:elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Monday, September 29, 2025 9:11
To: Charles Carriere <charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com <mailto:charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com> >; Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: DNEXT - Login Credential

 

Morning Charles,

 

Hope you had a nice weekend – so for the trial the fertilizer dashboards have been placed in GnO Economics (see screenshot below) – you can also find fertilizers in the LineUps in dashboards (that’s where the WAF lineups are), also in Customs and the urea balance in SND. There is also a tradematrix for urea, DAP and ammonia.

 

Saber can book you in a tour to help – and then if there are any specific things that you need let me know as this is just a start and we can start building dashboards together.

 

All the best,

 

Elfi

 

 



 

From: Charles Carriere <charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com <mailto:charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com> > 
Sent: 29 September 2025 09:46
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >; Elfi Middelbeek <elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io <mailto:elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: DNEXT - Login Credential

 

Saber good morning, 

 

Below has been done. I change the password.

Next step? I don’t see anything related to fertilizers in the dashboard

 

I will be available end PM today or late PM tomorrow.

 

Best regards,

 

Charles

 

 



Charles Carrière

Senior Fertilizer Advisor

Valency International Pte Ltd,

10 Anson Road, 18-26, International Plaza, Singapore079903

Mobile [+33 6 32 93 97 58] & [+225 050295 3252]

charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com <mailto:charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com> 

www.valencyinternational.com <http://www.valencyinternational.com/>  I Visit us at <https://www.facebook.com/valencyinternational/>

Hello Charles,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We would like to propose a quick demo session where I can walk you through the key features and show you some tips for using it more effectively.

Please let us know which time suits you best and we will arrange accordingly.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

From: Elfi Middelbeek <elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io>
Sent: Monday, September 29, 2025 9:11
To: Charles Carriere <charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com>; Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXT - Login Credential

 

Morning Charles,

 

Hope you had a nice weekend – so for the trial the fertilizer dashboards have been placed in GnO Economics (see screenshot below) – you can also find fertilizers in the LineUps in dashboards (that’s where the WAF lineups are), also in Customs and the urea balance in SND. There is also a tradematrix for urea, DAP and ammonia.

 

Saber can book you in a tour to help – and then if there are any specific things that you need let me know as this is just a start and we can start building dashboards together.

 

All the best,

 

Elfi

 

 

 

From: Charles Carriere <charles.carriere@valencyinternational.com>
Sent: 29 September 2025 09:46
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Cc: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>; Elfi Middelbeek <elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: DNEXT - Login Credential

 

Saber good morning,

 

Below has been done. I change the password.

Next step? I don’t see anything related to fertilizers in the dashboard

 

I will be available end PM today or late PM tomorrow.

 

Best regards,

 

Charles

 

 

Charles Carrière

Senior Fertilizer Advisor

Valency International Pte Ltd,

All the best,

 

Elfi
